definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)
Changting county level city in Longyan 龍岩|龙岩, Fujian
Changting county in Longyan 龍岩|龙岩, Fujian

pinyin: Ke4 li3 si1 ting1 · Bei4 er3
Kun1 ting1 · Ta3 lun2 ti2 nuo4
Kun1 ting1 · Ta3 lun2 di4 nuo4

definition: lines formed by waves on a beach

sentences.english: Thenceforth, M. Madeleine was transfigured in Fantine's eyes.
sentences.chinese: 從此馬德蘭先生在芳汀的心目中是另外一個人了。

sentences.english: Objective To study the efficacy of paroxetine with buspirone in the treatment of depression.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討丁螺環酮與帕羅西汀聯合治療抑鬱症的效果。

sentences.english: Theanti-inflammatory effect of Atorvastatin maybe beyond that of lipid lowering .
sentences.chinese: 阿託伐他汀的抗炎作用獨立於降脂作用之外。

sentences.english: Conclusion Atorvastatin is similar in curative effect and safety to Xuezhikang.
sentences.chinese: 結論血脂康與阿託伐他汀降脂療效與安全性相似。

sentences.english: ConclusionAtorvastation can be used for early renal damage in patients with essential hypertension.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討阿託伐他汀對高血壓早期腎損害的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To prepare the dispersible tablet of Fluvastatin Sodium.
sentences.chinese: 目的製備氟伐他汀鈉分散片。

sentences.english: Raoul, the doctor, the maid and Christine were the only ones left in the room.
sentences.chinese: 屋裏只剩下拉烏爾，醫生，女僕和克莉斯汀。
我告訴了克麗絲汀他的好意。

sentences.english: Statins may reduce the risk for VTE in this patient population, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，他汀類藥物可能會降低這類患者的VTE風險。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical effect of atorvastatin on arteriosclerosis plaque of carotid artery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討阿託伐他汀對頸動脈粥樣斑塊的臨牀影響。

sentences.english: Rosuvastatin appears to lower the risk of heart disease in healthy people.
sentences.chinese: 健康人使用瑞舒伐他汀能夠降低心臟疾病的風險。

sentences.english: In general, I wouldn't worry about the effect of statins on memory.
sentences.chinese: 總的來說，我不會擔心司他汀對記憶力的影響。

sentences.english: There were more serious side effects in the Herceptin group than in the observation group.
sentences.chinese: 但赫賽汀治療組嚴重副反應比觀察組多。

sentences.english: Fluvastatin therapy was not associated with a significant increase in the rate of adverse events.
sentences.chinese: 氟伐他汀治療與不良事件發生率顯著增加無關。

definition: Anaphalis yedoensis (pearly everlasting reed)/used in Japanese names with phonetic value Ogi
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
phonetic fei or fi/elegant/phi (Greek letter Φ, φ)
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
